channel.title: Magic training i Need Ideas. good idea = good rs2 reward
channel.description: Ok i got ranging training and combat and all that stuff putted in minigames but now i need something for magic i was thinking of 2 teleport rings u click and u can teleport between the the 2 places but thats boring just clicking so i need ideas for a reward or something that u need to do for the teleport helper gets a Runescape reward!

item.title: Magic training i Need Ideas. good idea = good rs2 reward
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

give them only wind strike, the stronger the monster thay kill with it the more xp tay get for mage ( set xp)

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Magic training i Need Ideas. good idea = good rs2 reward
item.dc:creator: @Terrordog Terrordog
item.description:
@Terrordog wrote:

[quote=“alvaroboldo, post:4, topic:71161”]Making Portals That are everywhere and every time you use 1 portal you get a clue of where is the other…

And everytime you use portal you get xp
:P[/quote]i tought of that like u need to find the right portal to get exp if u get the rong one you get no exp,but then again it takes allot of space something smaller more ideas,the reward is worth 5 minuts of your time trust me!
